synopsis.text: A lonely monkey is born from stone high atop a mountain, with no name, parents, or friends. One day he meets RinRin, a kind female monkey who becomes his friend and encourages him to prove his bravery to the other monkeys. After passing a courageous test, the monkey is made king. However, the power goes to his head - he becomes vain and arrogant. Seeking greater challenges, the monkey king leaves RinRin and journeys to train with a sage hermit in the mountains. The hermit names the monkey Son-Goku and teaches him magical abilities. Empowered but unchecked by humility, Son-Goku travels to Heaven to challenge the very gods themselves, who defeat him. As punishment for his arrogance, Son-Goku is sentenced to accompany a monk on a journey to learn wisdom and restraint. This begins another adventure for the headstrong monkey, who still has much to learn about life, power, and what it truly means to rule.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
